attributes.action: Remove our MP Guy Opperman from office immediately. Hexham Constituency.
attributes.additional_details:
Our MP voted NO to protecting the NHS from foreign investment, protecting a free NHS service, protecting employee rights, protecting Safety and quality in the NHS, protecting pricing in the NHS and protecting patient data in this bill.

New Clause 17 - International trade agreements: health or care services
Trade Bill – in the House of Commons at 9:00 pm on 20th July 2020.

https://www.theyworkforyou.com/debates/?id=2020-07-20a.1948.0#g1949.0
attributes.background:
Guy consistently votes NO to crucial bills brought before the House of Commons. 

Constituents of Hexham, Corbridge, riding mill, Stocksfield, Mickley, Prudhoe and other towns and suburbs of the Hexham Constituency have signed this petition to have him removed as our MP.

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for individual MPs to lose their jobs.
